NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CASSAVA: I'm thrilled to lend my assistance in testing the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop's</color> new invention today, Daz!
2
1
CASSAVA: I cannot wait to see you walk beyond this projection pool!
3
2
DAZ: I read you bright and clear, my love!
4
3
DAZ: Now, for the moment of truth... Will the invention allow me to walk beyond the projection pool?
5
4
CASSAVA: Daz? Did something interrupt your thought? Your voyager has just disappeared..
6
4
CASSAVA: Daz, do you still read me? Daz..?
